## Q1


```{r logLikBernoulli}
logLikBernoulli <- function(data) {
  p_grid <- seq(0, 1, by = 0.001)
  loglik <- sapply(p_grid, function(p) sum(log(p^data * (1-p)^(1-data))))
  p_grid[which.max(loglik)]
}
data <- c(1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1)
p_max <- logLikBernoulli(data)
print(p_max)
```
